hero.description:
Former Technical Localization Specialist (Apple, Netflix, AWS).
Aspiring Software Developer & DevOps Engineer.
After 5+ years of localizing interfaces for global tech giants, I am now transitioning to the source to optimize the very code I once translated.

about.title: Engineering Perspective
about.p1: My education at Boğaziçi University and my technical translation career taught me a vital lesson: Integrity of the whole depends on details often overlooked.
about.p2: While serving as a "Lead Reviewer" for industry giants like Netflix and Apple, I audited and refined not just words, but UI string errors, contextual discrepancies, and User Experience (UX). This process sparked my interest in the "mechanics of software" and data flow, rather than just the surface-level interface.
about.p3: I am currently bridging this analytical background with coding proficiency through Harvard CS50 and advanced bootcamps. To formalize my expertise with a degree, I am also pursuing Management Information Systems at Istanbul University.
about.p4: My Goal: To become a well-equipped developer with the vision of a Software Architect, driven by lifelong learning.
about.focus_backend: Backend Logic: Learning to build robust algorithms using C and Python.
about.focus_devops: DevOps & Cloud: Acquiring cross-functional knowledge in CI/CD, Linux, and Automation culture.
about.focus_quality: Quality Code: Driven by a passion for efficiency and sustainability, I adhere to Clean Code principles and Lean Six Sigma methodologies.

projects.title: Projects
projects.nejdev_desc: Built using Vanilla JS and Clean Code principles, eliminating framework dependencies. Leverages Cloudflare infrastructure for DNS management and performance optimization.
projects.readability_desc: A text complexity analysis algorithm developed for Harvard's CS50. Utilizes the Coleman-Liau index to evaluate reading levels.
projects.gainsmax_desc: A performance-driven, static web application performing client-side fitness calculations (body fat, RDI etc.)

experience.title: Professional Foundation
experience.job1_list:
• Spearheaded Netflix Studio's transition into a highest-volume client account.
  • Authored the "Netflix Studio Localization Turkish Style Guide" from the ground up.
  • Oversaw UI string testing, context analysis, and QA processes for Apple, Google, and Netflix.
experience.job2_list:
• Translated technical documentation for Amazon Web Services (AWS).
  • Localized cybersecurity content for Kaspersky.
  • Actively engaging in software development training and building personal projects.

contact.title: What's Next?
contact.text: I am currently open to DevOps, Backend, or Full Stack internship and junior roles. I believe the best way to learn is by doing. I am ready to bring value to your team with my multilingual proficiency (Tr, En, Jp, Ru), technical foundation, and "lifelong learner" mindset. Also, I thrive on feedback!
